references.paper_title: Interaction networks for learning about objects, relations and physics
references.reason: This paper introduces Interaction Networks, a type of graph neural network architecture that is fundamental to the Graph-based Ensemble Forecasting Model (Graph-EFM) proposed in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Accurate medium-range global weather forecasting with 3D neural networks
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the state-of-the-art in deterministic machine learning based weather prediction, which the current paper improves upon by adding probabilistic forecasting.

references.paper_title: Learning skillful medium-range global weather forecasting
references.reason: This is a highly influential paper that introduces the GraphCast model, which is directly extended by the authors to include probabilistic forecasting and hierarchical graph structures.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion models, which are discussed as an alternative probabilistic modeling approach, although they are noted as computationally expensive.
This paper introduces the Variational Autoencoder (VAE), which forms the theoretical basis for the probabilistic formulation of Graph-EFM.
